page.title: 10Law And Order In Bury
page.content: We interviewed the local Policeman for Bury.Before he became a Policeman he was a Book Keeper and a Heating Installer.He has lived in this area all of his life.The most common crime in this area is theft and burglary.In Cambridgeshire there are approximately 1240 Policeman.Other than solving crimes he has lots of other duties including road traffic accidents, missing persons,fires,sudden deaths, domestic disputes,road traffic offences,crime prevention and any situation where the public need assistance.He was not envolved in the miners strike,but he was envolved in the policing of the Molesworth demonstration.
